questions.question_text: An IS auditor is reviewing a data conversion project. Which of the following is the auditor's BEST recommendation prior to go-live?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Conducting a mock conversion test is specifically focused on testing the data conversion process itself and is crucial for ensuring a smooth transition during go-live.

Selected Answer: D
Having adequate security (option A) is important, but checking includes specific security measures and policy implementation, etc. On the other hand, the most important thing about the audit trail is that all critical operations are properly logged.

Selected Answer: A
An audit trail is a record of system activities that is used to facilitate the reconstruction, review, and examination of the sequence of activities surrounding or leading to a specific operation, event, or problem. Ensuring that an application's audit trail has adequate security is crucial. This involves safeguarding the audit trail from unauthorized access, modification, or deletion.
must be A or D, A because no one sure all log is collected, if it is missing

questions.question_text: An IS auditor should ensure that an application's audit trail:
Which of the following would provide the BEST evidence of an IT strategy committee's effectiveness?

choices.A: The minutes from the IT strategy committee meetings
choices.C: Synchronization of IT activities with corporate objectives

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Synchronization of IT activities with corporate objectives

Selected Answer: C
The effectiveness of an IT strategy committee is best evidenced by the synchronization of IT activities with corporate objectives. This means that the IT strategy aligns with and supports the overall goals and objectives of the organization. If the IT strategy is well-aligned with corporate objectives, it demonstrates that the committee is effective in guiding IT decisions to contribute to the success of the business.

Selected Answer: C
It's obviously C.
This is talking about the effectiveness C is the answer
C. Synchronization of IT activities with corporate objectives

questions.question_text: An IS auditor is reviewing the business requirements for the deployment of a new website. Which of the following cryptographic systems would provide the BEST evidence of secure communications on the Internet?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
When reviewing business requirements for the deployment of a new website and considering secure communications on the Internet, Transport Layer Security (TLS) is the cryptographic system that would provide the BEST evidence. TLS is a protocol that ensures privacy between communicating applications and users on the Internet. It is widely used to secure web traffic, providing encryption and authentication to protect the confidentiality and integrity of data transmitted between a website and its users.

choices.B: All users who have followed user provisioning processes provided by management
choices.D: All users provisioned after the finding was originally identified
choices.A: All users provisioned after management resolved the audit issue
choices.C: All users provisioned after the final audit report was issued

questions.question_text: An IS auditor is performing a follow-up audit for findings identified in an organization's user provisioning process. Which of the following is the MOST appropriate population to sample from when testing for remediation?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. All users provisioned after management resolved the audit issue: This option would indeed provide direct evidence that management has effectively implemented the remediation controls since it focuses on users provisioned after the specific audit issues were addressed.

C. All users provisioned after the final audit report was issued: While this option captures users provisioned under the new processes, it might include instances where management had not yet fully implemented the remediation controls.

Selected Answer: C
A is not advisable as there is a possibility that management did not resolve the issue, follow-up audit coverage should be after final audit report period.

Selected Answer: A
When performing a follow-up audit for findings identified in an organization's user provisioning process, the most appropriate population to sample from when testing for remediation would be:
A. All users provisioned after management resolved the audit issue
This population includes users provisioned after the management took action to address the audit findings. Sampling from this population helps assess whether the remediation efforts have been effective and whether the user provisioning process is now in compliance with the desired controls.

Selected Answer: C
All users provisioned after the final audit report was issued. This population includes all users who were provisioned after the final audit report was issued. This population is the most specific because it only includes users provisioned after the final audit report was issued, indicating that management has completed all remediation steps
C. All users provisioned after the final audit report was issued

Selected Answer: A
answer is A

Selected Answer: A
Shoud be A. All users provisioned after management resolved the audit issue
In my opinion should be A
